# makeMachineLearningCommandEncoder()

**Instance Method**

Creates a machine learning command encoder.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeMachineLearningCommandEncoder() -> (any MTL4MachineLearningCommandEncoder)?
```

## Return Value

The created [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4MachineLearningCommandEncoder] instance , or `nil` if the function fails.
